com.myscript.atk.sltw

Interface SingleLineTextWidgetApi.OnSelectionChangedListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SingleLineTextWidgetApi

    public static interface SingleLineTextWidgetApi.OnSelectionChangedListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the text selection changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSelectionChanged(int start, int end, String[] labels, int selectedIndex)
      Called when the text selection changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onSelectionChanged

        void onSelectionChanged(int start,
                      int end,
                      String[] labels,
                      int selectedIndex)
        Called when the text selection changes.
        Parameters:
        start - Character index of the first character of the selection or -1 if selection is empty.
        end - Character index past the last character of the selection or -1 if selection is empty.
        labels - Array of candidate labels for this selection range or null if selection is empty.
        selectedIndex - Index of the currently selected candidate label or -1 if selection is empty.
